text1: Change your mind for free for 15 days
text1plus: Free Returns within 15 days if you Change Your Mind (returned goods must still have seals, stamps, and product boxes intact), applicable to certain products. In addition, at the time of receipt, you You can check and return the goods for free.
text2plus: Get double the amount you paid for non-genuine products from ZYMY Mall
text3plus: Free shipping offer up to 40,000 VND for ZYMY Mall orders from 150,000 VND
